cast.name: 戴曼德·布·阿布德 Diamand Bou Abboud

introduction: Alex is celebrating her sixtieth birthday party in a windy Mediterranean sea resort. Waiting for a guests she is killing time by blowing balloons. Ali, the waiter is serving her whiskey upon whiskey, creating a complicity between them. Time passes by and nobody shows up but Gina, a Russian prostitute running away from her pimp. Ali is hostile about Gina's eruption . Both of them will eventually offer Alex, an peculiar birthday party. Frank, the long awaited friend appears, hands her over her birthday present. The one she had asked him for. At last, she can put her plan into execution.
